tool.name: Create or add new images database
tool.description: Create new database for holding images Or add new images to existing database.

param.name: table_name
param.label: Table name
param.help: Current table name is 'Images'. New table will be created if table name does not exist

param.name: images_path
param.label: Original images path
param.help: Type in the absolute folder path of original images. e.g. '/Images/CroppedImages/'

param.name: masks_path
param.label: Mask images path
param.help: Type in the absolute folder path of mask images. e.g. '/Images/CellMasks/'

tool.help: Note: The data will be inserted to the destination database. The resulting text file in History pane contains the created database file path and the table name.
